original_title: Pancrase: Yes, We Are Hybrid Wrestlers 1
overview: Pancrase: Yes, We Are Hybrid Wrestlers 1 was the first mixed martial arts event held by Pancrase Hybrid Wrestling. It took place at the Tokyo Bay NK Hall in Urayasu, Chiba, Japan on September 21, 1993. The card featured many future MMA champions.
title: Pancrase: Yes, We Are Hybrid Wrestlers 1
